text: Portland State University is a public university in Portland, Oregon. The university has about 27,972 students. It was founded in 1946. The current president of the university is Ann Cudd. ==Sports== The men's athletics teams of the university are called the Vikings. They have 14 varsity teams and they compete in the Big Sky Conference. ==Other websites== *Portland State University's Official website *Portland State Vikings' Official athletics website Category:Big Sky Conference Category:Colleges and universities in Oregon Category:Portland, Oregon Category:1946 establishments in the United States Category:20th-century establishments in Oregon
title: Portland State University
